23#ifndef TCLAP_OPTIONAL_UNLABELED_TRACKER_H
24#define TCLAP_OPTIONAL_UNLABELED_TRACKER_H
25
26#include <tclap/ArgException.h>
27
28#include <string>
29
30namespace TCLAP {
31
32class OptionalUnlabeledTracker {
33public:
34 static void check(bool req, const std::string &argName);
35
36 static void gotOptional() { alreadyOptionalRef() = true; }
37
38 static bool &alreadyOptional() { return alreadyOptionalRef(); }
39
40private:
41 static bool &alreadyOptionalRef() {
42 static bool ct = false;
43 return ct;
44 }
45};
46
47inline void OptionalUnlabeledTracker::check(bool req,
48 const std::string &argName) {
49 if (OptionalUnlabeledTracker::alreadyOptional())
50 throw(SpecificationException(
51 "You can't specify ANY Unlabeled Arg following an optional "
52 "Unlabeled Arg",
53 argName));
54
55 if (!req) OptionalUnlabeledTracker::gotOptional();
56}
57
58} // namespace TCLAP
59
60#endif // TCLAP_OPTIONAL_UNLABELED_TRACKER_H
